Key:
(Just a little while ago, something sad happened.
My beloved pet suddenly disappeared.)

(I looked all over the neighborhood, but to no
avail. Where did she go? I wonder if she's doing
okay.)
(My rabbit, Yoshino.)

Man, I just can't settle down. I'm going to go
look for her again today. She may be at a shelter
somewhere.
I wonder who it is. Maybe a customer.
Coming!
Um, excuse me.
Oh, um... You are...?

(I opened the door, and there stood a girl.
I wonder who she is. I've never seen her before.)

May I help you? I was about to head out. I want to
go look for my pet...
Um, Shido-san... It's me...

Huh... what about you? Huh? Wait... how do you
know my name?
Shido-san, it's me... It's... Yoshino.
Huh...? You're... Yoshino...?
WHHHAAAAAAATTTT?!

Tell me, is it really possible for a rabbit to
turn into a human? That's like some kind
of fantasy story.

(The girl who claimed to be Yoshino was quiet from
the moment I let her in. She didn't really say
anything, and just quietly sat on the sofa.
...Shido-san?

Oh, well, it's not like I'm doubting you or
anything, but it's also kind of hard for me
to believe.
Man, what is your problem? Yoshino has come to\npay you back. Why are you so cold, Shido-kun?
Wh-What the?! The puppet is talking?!
How rude. I'm not a hand puppet, I'm Yoshinon.\nYoshinon is Yoshino's friend. Nice to meet you,\nShido-kun!

(Wh-What the heck? But I guess that part of the
design is the same, huh? Whatever comfort that
is.)

So, Yoshino and... Yoshinon, right? I'm Shido
Itsuka. Nice to meet you two.
Nice to... meet you, too.
Gosh, you guys know each other already, but\nyou're acting so awkward.

Hahaha... Sorry. So about this whole Yoshino
thing... I can't just take it in.
Hmm. Well I guess I understand. If only I could\nshow you some kind of proof.
U-Um... There is one thing... I can show you...
Oh, what is it?

I was bitten by a kitty when I was little, and I
have the same scar in the same place...
Oh, that's a good idea to show Shido-kun. I feel\nlike he'll believe you then. Good job, Yoshino!

A scar from a cat bite, huh? Oh yeah, I guess that
did happen. But where was that scar?

Um... on my butt. But if you want to see it,
Shido-san, I...

WHOA! Wait a minute. No thanks! You don't have
to take your clothes off! I believe you! I believe
you already!
Really?
Isn't that nice, Yoshino?

(Phew. I was so close to jail just now. I should
change the subject and talk about something else.)
So, anyways... About this paying me back" thing.

You've always taken care of me, so... I wanted to
pay back the... favor.
And that's why Yoshino came back.

A rabbit's return of a favor...? No, that's a
crane, huh... So then you're going to...
make me some cloth...?
Yes?
I can't really do anything... Sorry.

I-I guess I don't blame you... And it's not
something to apologize for. But, Yoshino...
Why did you become a human?

(I still don't fully believe that she's Yoshino,
though it would be touching if she went to
the trouble of becoming a human to come see me.)
Sorry...

I told you, no need to apologize... Don't get so
small like... Oh...!
What's the matter?

No, it's not a big deal... but I remember the
rabbit Yoshino would always curl up in a ball
on the corner of the sofa like that and sleep.
Huh...? Oh! Yes, I like doing that.

(For some reason, this melted away my doubts like
snow under the sunlight. This girl is Yoshino.
I feel like I understand now.)

Well, I guess it doesn't matter why you became
human. So, what do you plan on doing from
now on?

I... haven't thought about it yet. I was so
focused on paying you back...
Then you can stay with me.
What...?

You're going to pay me back, right? And it's not
like I'd tell you to leave, either.
Shido-kun. What do you mean by that? Don't tell\nme you plan on doing inappropriate things to this\nadorable Yoshino?! Paying you back with her body!

No, no, no! Of course not! I don't care about
favors or anything. I just mean you can stay with
me. I mean... you've always been family, Yoshino.

Since you're family, it's only natural for you to
stay here, right?
I... can? I can stay here forever?

Yeah, of course. Make yourself comfortable.
Oh... I forgot. Welcome home, Yoshino. I'm glad
you've come back.
Oh... Okay!

Now, there are going to be a lot of problems now
that you're back. I'll need to explain to Kotori.

And if you're going to live here as a human...
There will be lots of issues.
Hmm, what do I do?
Wh-What's the matter, Yoshino?!
I-I'm sorry. I knocked the juice cup over...

(That's right. Yoshino is a rabbit, despite her
appearance... I should've given her a straw.)

(Okay... now I'm in a bind. Yoshino is completely
drenched in juice, and it's fine if she could take
a bath, but...)

(Would she even know how to take a bath? If only
Kotori were here. But if we wait for her, Yoshino
might catch a cold... right? I think?)

(And this is how we ended up in this situation...
This definitely doesn't look good.)

Uh, Yoshinon? You probably know how to take a
bath, right?
Shido-kun, Yoshinon is also a former rabbit.\nOf course I don't know how to take a bath.

I don't know why... but I'm not satisfied
with that...
Well, who cares, Shido-kun?! This is your chance\nto look at the attractive Yoshino's naked body all\nyou want! A lucky pervert's big chance!

What the?! I-I didn't see it, okay?! I saw
nothing! And what makes you think I'm
a lucky pervert?!
Shido-kun, let's not sweat the details.

Sh-Shido-san. The bubbles, the bubbles...! I-I'm
not good at washing my body. Um, please... wash
my body like you usually do."	
Message	Shido	O-Okay...	
Message	None	(Yoshino is a rabbit. Yoshino is a rabbit.

Operator: Yoshino... is a rabbit. I'm not touching a
girl. So, calm down... Calm down.)"

Key:
All right, well... can you turn around? I'll start
with your head, okay?

Okay. Thank you. The bubbles... they're going in
my eyes... Shido-saaaan...
Whoa! Let me wash them off right now!
Yoshino, can you wash your own body?
I-It's difficult...
I guess it would be.
Shido-kun, do us a favor and just score already!
Wash her body.
Have her do it herself.
Argh. I got it! I'll wash it.

(Damn, I'll do it! I have zero ulterior motives!
I can wash a girl's body without it being weird!)

(It's not like I haven't taken a thousand baths
with Kotori before!)

Okay, Yoshino. I'm going to wash your arms first,
so lift them up for me.
O-Okay... Thank you, Shido-san.

(Okay I take it back. Just hearing Yoshino's voice
so close is driving me nuts. And to make things
worse, Yoshino's skin is so smooth and soft.)
U-Um, is something the matter, Shido-san?
N-Nothing. I'm going to wash the other side, too.
The other side...? So... you want to see my body?

N-No! I'm going to wash your other arm! So lift
your other arm up.

(Oh, God. I almost saw it. Dear God, please
protect me.)
Hey, Shido-kun. There are still parts you haven't\nwashed. What are you going to do? Hey, hey,\nShido-kunnnn.

(Ngh... I'm a man too. How can I back down from
being egged on like this? I'm going to commit!)

Okay, Yoshino. So this is how you should wash your
whole body. I think you can do the rest yourself.
I'll be in the bathtub, okay?
What? But...
You can do it, right?!
O-Okay!

(Before giving her any time to respond, I jumped
into the water. Honestly, I was past my limit in
all kinds of ways.)
...Gosh, Shido-kun. You're such a wuss.

(Say what you will. God, I think I was somehow
able to maintain rationality.)

All right, Yoshino. I'll explain how to wash your
body, so give it a try, okay? Just get the suds
and spread them over your body.

(No matter if Yoshino's mentally a rabbit, she's
physically a girl. I can't just touch a girl's
body.)
...Shido-kun?
Don't say a word, Yoshinon. I can't hear anything.
Okay, Shido-san... I'll do it myself.

That-a girl, Yoshino. I can't see your face, but I
know you can do this.

Okay, Shido-san. So, um... Please show me. How to
wash myself.
...Hm? What did you just say?

I'm going to copy how you wash your body, so show
me how you do it, Shido-san.
(U-Um, that imagery is completely inappropriate.)
Shido-kun. Yoshino's putting herself out there.\nYou can teach her, right?

*Whimper*... Okay... Then I'll close my eyes, so
Yoshino, look this way.
O-Okay.

(If I were to slightly open my eyes, Yoshino would
be right in front of me. Ngh... I can't. Don't
imagine it. Be zen... Just teach her.)

So, you wash your body like this. When you're
ready to wash the other side, you're going to
hold the sponge on the other hand.

Um, Shido-san? I can't hold it on that side
because I have Yoshinon... How can I hold it?

(Crap...! I forgot Yoshinon was here. Wh-What do
we do... How am I going to teach her with my eyes
closed.)
Shido-kun, teach her. How should she wash the\nother areas?

I-It's over now. Yoshinon, you know the rest,
right?!

(I just blurted it out and ran out of the tub.
...I have to retreat, or I won't last.)
Gosh. Fine. Yoshino, Yoshinon will teach you.

(You can teach her, Yoshinon?! Then what was all
that effort for? ...*sigh*. Whatever. I'm going
to forget all this and just soak in the tub.)
Were you able to wash up, Yoshino?

...Scrub, scrub, scrub. Yes, Shido-san. I'm fine.
Bathing... is fun.
Yeah, it makes you feel refreshed, right?

I... would like to go in... with you again
some day.
Sorry, um... You'll have to excuse me.

(*Sigh*... I finished my goal of getting Yoshino
bathed, so I guess I'll get out of the bathroom
soon.)
I'm home! Dear brother, I'm home!

(Ah...?! Crap, I totally forgot about Kotori.
Of all the times she could come home?!)

(If she sees this, it'll all be over. I can't even
make any excuses at this point.)
Yoshino, hide this instant!
...Hide? But... where?
Uh...

Where are you, Onii-chan? You're not in your
room... Oh, I know! Hahaha. You're playing
hide-and-seek!

...Whoaaaa, there's no place to hide in the
bathroom!

Oh, I know, the bathroom. It was really hot out
today, so I'll be joining you!
No, Kotori! It's dangerous, don't come in!
Hahah, here I come!
Aaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!

Oh... Onii-chan, who's that? And why are you in the
bathroom with her?

(It's over... No, I'm going to have to take a
chance! I'm going to take a chance on
Kotori having faith in me.)

U-Um, Kotori. I know you may not be able to
believe me, but hear me out. This girl is Yoshino,
the rabbit.

So, Yoshino turned into a girl... and she came to
pay back a favor. Some stuff happened, and we
ended up in the bath...

(Okay, this is not going to work. Not this
explanation.)
O-O-O-Onii-chan... turned into a pervert!
Noooooooooooo!
Huh...?

(Afterward, Kotori allowed Yoshino to live with
us, but... this incident was something that was
brought up over and over again.)
